snippet.title: Elara's Light: Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming this October. Wishlist Elara's Light on Steam now!

Elara’s Light is a relaxing, yet punishing 2D precision platformer. Every jump tests perseverance and precision—one mistake could drag Elara back into the darkness. Uncover the stories of the forsaken, and guide Elara toward the light she longs for.

In this high-stakes vertical 2D platformer, you’ll guide Elara through a beautiful yet unforgiving world, where every leap counts. One mistake could send Elara tumbling back into the depths she’s struggled to escape.

Features:
- High-Stakes Gameplay: Test your skills in a world where precision is key.
- Beautiful & Relaxing Environment: Simple visuals and relaxing soundtracks that contrast with the grueling journey.
- Simple Controls: Easy to learn, but difficult to master.
- Shortcuts for the brave: Skippable jumps for those daring enough to take risks.
- Stopwatch: Track how quickly you can reach the top & compete with friends.
- No Enemies but Yourself: The only obstacles are the doubt and emotions within.
- Touching Stories: Meet the forsaken, who have given up on their journey.

Do you have what it takes to escape the darkness?
